package.name: Filza File Manager
package.shortDescription: File Manager for iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch. Supports iOS 7+.

descriptionlist.description: Filza File Manager 3.9.0-2, compatible to iOS 7.0 - later.

You can also have
a multi-line item.
